description.excerpt: Collection of libraries to ease in JavaScript RDF development.
A lot of IRI/URI manipulation can happen while working with linked data, this package provides

Utilities for working with link actions 
and link middleware. 
Utilities for reading and manipulating different kinds of RDF collections (rdf:Seq, rdf:List) 
Utilities to quickly create linked deltas, an rdf-native 
way to express and process changes in state.
* A data factory for creating RDF data.
Utilities for working with RDF/Linked Data in JavaScript / TypeScript

installation.excerpt: The following libraries are used by these packages.
